mapper.select: SELECT ORGANIZATIONID,ASSISTANTMANAGER,COMPANYID,CREATED,CREATER,DESCRIPTION,EMPQTY,ENAME, FAX,FULLNAME,ICONCLS,LASTMOD,MANAGER,MODIFYER,MYID,PID,SHORTNAME,STATE,STATUS,TEL FROM ORGANIZATION WHERE STATUS = 'A' AND (PID IS NULL)

SELECT ORGANIZATIONID,ASSISTANTMANAGER,COMPANYID,CREATED,CREATER,DESCRIPTION,EMPQTY,ENAME, FAX,FULLNAME,ICONCLS,LASTMOD,MANAGER,MODIFYER,MYID,PID,SHORTNAME,STATE,STATUS,TEL FROM ORGANIZATION WHERE STATUS='A' AND PID = #{pid}
mapper.update: UPDATE ORGANIZATION SET STATUS='I' WHERE ORGANIZATIONID=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE ORGANIZATION SET DESCRIPTION=#{description},ICONCLS=#{iconCls},FULLNAME=#{fullName},LASTMOD=#{lastmod}, MODIFYER=#{modifyer},MYID=#{myId},ENAME=#{ename},PID=#{pid},SHORTNAME=#{shortName}, STATE=#{state},STATUS=#{status},FAX=#{fax},TEL=#{tel},MANAGER=#{manager},EMPQTY=#{empQty}, COMPANYNAME=#{companyName},PNAME=#{pName} WHERE ORGANIZATIONID=#{organizationId}
